base_character.name: aom3a1
base_character.base_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, anime game character design, single character only, full body, standing, idle pose, centered composition, symmetrical body, clear readable silhouette, cute but clean proportions (not super deformed, not realistic), large expressive eyes, simple facial features suitable for sprite conversion, short black hair, simple straight hairstyle, wearing a red jacket (clean design, minimal logo), blue pants, white sneakers, outfit designed for customization (clear layers, readable shapes), flat colors, clean shading, minimal gradients, clear lineart, consistent anatomy, neutral expression, plain light background

negative_prompt: lowres, worst quality, blurry, jpeg artifacts, pixelated, mosaic, broken pixels, painterly, oil painting, watercolor, realistic texture, heavy shadows, dramatic lighting, multiple characters, duplicate body, extra limbs, extra arms, extra legs, bad anatomy, deformed body, big head tiny body, tiny head long body, cropped, out of frame, dynamic pose, action pose
